attributes.action: Demand that the Prime Minister publishes the complete Sue Gray report.
attributes.additional_details:
The British public has every right to know whether the rules they have been made to follow have been broken by the very people who made them. The fabric of democracy depends on the transparency of the people we elect and we, the people, should be able to hold them to full account.

Unfortunately, the Prime Minister does reserve the power to withhold the findings of said report from the public, therefore it is imperative that he is pressured by that very public to do what is right and honourable.
attributes.background: On behalf of the British public, we demand that the Prime Minister publishes the full and unedited Sue Gray report upon permission from the Metropolitan Police and as soon as it is legally possible.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
